price: Berkatalah orang-orang kafir, "Kamu bukan seorang yang dijadikan rasul".   Katakanlah, "Cukuplah Allah menjadi saksi antaraku dan kamu dan antara orang yang mempunyai ilmu Alkitab" 778.
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَسۡتَ مُرۡسَلٗاۚ قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ وَمَنۡ عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
footnotes: 778.  Yaitu ulama-ulama ahli kitab yang memeluk agama Islam.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lasta mur'salan qul kafā bil-lahi shahīdan baynī wabaynakum waman ʿindahu ʿil'mu al-kitābi
